https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/t2OULqhig6kuNjmUs7X61km1XbP.jpg João's mother mysteriously disappeared when he was a baby. Having grown up without the guidance of a mother, João ends up living in Porto, where he meets a girl with whom he falls in love. Despite this, bad influences make João enter a cycle of self-destruction. A Mãe que Sempre Sonhei
